item.title: Car vs. Pole and a Stolen Excavator
item.description: A chaotic situation unfolds involving a wrecked car and a stolen excavator — see how crews handle this unpredictable recovery.

media:content.media:title: Car vs. Pole and a Stolen Excavator
media:content.media:description: A chaotic situation unfolds involving a wrecked car and a stolen excavator — see how crews handle this unpredictable recovery.

item.title: On The Road for a Code 3 Call!
item.description: Responding fast to a high-priority Code 3 call, the team rushes to assist in a time-sensitive roadside recovery operation.

item.title: Can We Save This Truck From Falling?
item.description: A truck teeters on the edge — watch the precise recovery work that could prevent a total loss and restore it to safety.

item.title: It Is What It Is. Our Equipment Breaks Too! Lifting a Lift
item.description: Even the toughest equipment can fail — watch as a broken lift gets rescued and repaired with the same precision it once delivered.

item.title: The Eaton Cummins Endurant XD Pro
item.description: Explore the Eaton Cummins Endurant XD Pro — a transmission built for power, reliability, and performance in demanding heavy-duty conditions.

item.title: Night Rescue: Saving a Stuck Car
item.description: Under the cover of night, a delicate recovery operation unfolds as a stranded car is pulled to safety with skill and precision.

item.title: Gasoline Tanker Stuck on Road Edge
item.description: A fully loaded fuel tanker leans dangerously off the road — crews work carefully to recover it safely without spills or damage.

item.title: Rotator Recovery on a Precarious Gravel Road!
item.description: A recovery team tackles a challenging job on a steep gravel road, using precision and control to stabilize and tow a stranded vehicle.

item.title: Messy Trash Truck Wreck!
item.description: Crews work to safely clear and recover a messy trash truck accident, showing the teamwork and precision behind complex road cleanups.

item.title: Trailer in Trouble
item.description: A routine haul turns into a tough recovery as a trailer slips off the road — watch the crew get it back on track.

item.title: Rotator Takes on a New Challenge
item.description: A heavy-duty rotator faces one of its toughest recoveries yet — precision and teamwork in action.

item.title: School Bus Flips in Flood!
item.description: After a severe flood, a school bus overturns — see the careful recovery process that brings it back upright

item.title: Impala In The Bush!
item.description: A stranded Impala meets the mud and brush — watch how recovery crews handle this off-road situation safely

item.title: High Winds, Deep Mud, One Tough Rescue
item.description: Battling strong winds and thick mud, the team pulls off a challenging vehicle recovery with precision and grit.

item.title: Trusting the "Pick & Pull"
item.description: When it comes to car parts, sometimes you have to trust the Pick & Pull. See how this visit turns into a test of skill and luck.

item.title: Recovering an SUV After a Slide
item.description: Watch a recovery crew pull an SUV back onto the road while prioritizing safety and assessing any damage.

item.title: Front Wheels Detached: What Happened
item.description: Inspecting a vehicle after the front wheels detached — a careful, non-graphic overview of damage assessment and next steps.

item.title: Midnight Trailer Recovery
item.description: A nighttime recovery team rights a tipped trailer, highlighting safety checks, teamwork, and the recovery process.

item.title: Getting a Trailer Back on Its Wheels
item.description: A step by step look at how a recovery team rights a trailer and secures it for safe transport, focusing on technique, teamwork and safety.

item.title: Head on Crash Code Response Double Time
item.description: Emergency crews respond to a head-on collision. A factual look at scene safety, responder actions, and care for those involved.
